content: Morning Rohan ‚Äî with your diagnostic review done, this week‚Äôs about delivering your first full integrated plan. Ruby will walk you through logistics, and Carla will loop in Javier for the nutrition framework.
Got it, Neel. Excited to see it all come together üëç
Hi Rohan ‚Äî I've booked a 30-min video call Wed 11:30 with Carla + Javier to go through the practical swaps for your meals. Will send link later.
Perfect, thanks Ruby.
Quick data note: last Sat, your Oura data showed HRV dropped ~20% and deep sleep shortened after 2+ drinks. One drink had no noticeable impact. Might help in planning recovery & cognitive workdays.
That's interesting‚Ä¶ makes sense why Sunday morning felt foggy.
Confirming with you right now, all supplements (Vit D3/K2, Omega-3, psyllium husk) ordered, will be delivered Wed. Subscriptions set for monthly refill.
Morning Carla. I've been meaning to tell you I really don't like protein shakes.
Morning! Are you open to exploring Greek yogurt or cottage cheese if we drop powders?
Some quick whole-food swaps could be: Greek yogurt + berries, cottage cheese + fruit, or pre-cooked chicken skewers with veg. All 15-20g protein in ~200cal.
That would be perfect. Will try it out tomorrow.
I have coordinated with Sarah and Javier to arrange for the desired swaps. You are all ready to go on the new diet from tomorrow!
Also, heads-up: your Consolidated Supplement Protocol doc is in your inbox with clear dosages & timing, so you don't need to think about it.
Got it. Looks clean and easy to follow.
How's the daily mobility drill going? Even 5 min keeps that muscle imbalance from creeping back.
4/7 last week‚Ä¶ better than before but room to improve.
Good progress. Let's aim for 5/7 this week. Maybe you can even tie it to your morning coffee as a cue.
Reminder: Javier call at 11:30 today. Zoom link here: [link]
Hi Javier, we'll keep it simple. 1) Swap seed oils for avocado/olive. 2) Add psyllium husk in smoothies. 3) Boost protein to ~120g/day for Rohan.
Thanks both. That was painless. Appreciate you taking it off my plate üôè
By the way, supplements arrived at your condo lobby. I'll message Sarah to bring them in.
Sarah confirmed, all good.
Morning Rohan. Just flagging, Vit D3/K2 best taken with a fat-containing meal for absorption. Otherwise no changes for now.
Got it. I'll take it with breakfast.
We'll push your strength session tomorrow earlier since you're flying to Jakarta in the evening.
Thanks, that works.

Your 'Big 3' nutrition priorities for the next quarter: 1) Increase soluble fiber (think oats, legumes, psyllium) to lower ApoB, 2) Hit 1.6g/kg protein daily, 3) Eliminate processed seed oils. Will text Javier about them as well
Easy to remember. Appreciate it.
Your hotel in Jakarta confirmed high-protein breakfast options. I'll check in Sat to see how it works for you.
Boarding now
Morning (Jakarta time) ‚Äî how was that breakfast test run?
Tried the omelette + yogurt combo. Surprisingly filling.
Good to know. We'll keep that as a travel fallback.
Your step count today is way up (19k). Might want an earlier wind-down to offset travel fatigue.
Will do. Big day tomorrow too.
Sarah, is the flight back to SG still on schedule for 8pm? I'll have Monday morning plan updates waiting.
Yes, no changes.
Safe flight back. Will message in the AM once your updated plan is in the app.
Thanks Ruby. Good week of progress overall.
Glad to hear that ‚Äî we'll keep building on it next week.
